org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class FluidBlockListener
extends org.bukkit.event.block.BlockListener

catches block based events

          Constructor taking the FluidFlow plugin as a parameter
 
Method Summary
 void onBlockBreak(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockBreakEvent event)
          checks each of the adjacent blocks to the one broken and adds flows to the corresponding fluid
 void onBlockFromTo(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockFromToEvent event)
          is called when a normal minecraft fluid tries to flow, check to see if the type is registered with the fluid flow plugin, if so cancel it
 void onBlockPhysics(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockPhysicsEvent event)
          is called when a block is affected by gravity and tests to see if it is a type that is registered, if it is cancel the event
 void onBlockPlace(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockPlaceEvent event)
          is called when a block is placed and tests to see if it is a type that is registered with the plugin, if so it adds the block to the flow list of the fluid that has registered that material
